introduce.title: What is PD Note
introduce.label: Introduce
introduce.description: PD Note is a comprehensive ticket management platform that helps customer support teams organize, track, and resolve customer issues efficiently.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About PD Note
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us at TODO: set your support email.

items.question: What is PD Note and who is it for?
items.answer: PD Note is a ticket management platform designed for internal customer support teams. It helps teams organize, track, and resolve customer issues efficiently using kanban boards, notes, and progress tracking.

items.question: How do I sign in to PD Note?
items.answer: PD Note supports Google OAuth login for secure and convenient access. Simply use your company Google account to sign in.

items.question: Can I customize the kanban board workflow?
items.answer: Yes, you can customize ticket statuses and workflow stages to match your team's support process.

items.question: How does progress tracking work?
items.answer: PD Note provides real-time dashboards showing ticket status, team performance metrics, and progress indicators to help you monitor your support operations.

items.question: Can multiple team members work on the same ticket?
items.answer: Yes, PD Note supports team collaboration with features like comments, mentions, and shared notes for each ticket.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes, PD Note uses industry-standard security practices including secure authentication and data encryption to protect your support data.
